title: Why I Like MVC
post_content: MVC is set up in a way to keep separate files for the model view and controller that interact together to make a working program.

title: Users used my product
post_content: I had users use my product. I'm not sure I like feeling used. Why do we use using and users to describe our client interactions how about explorers instead.

title: Homework does it ever end?
post_content: When you do homework, there always seems to be another homework to do after. Is there an end to the dark tunnel called homework? Is it a shiny rainbow called work?
